ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Guide us on the Straight Path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Guide us (O Lord) to the path that is straight,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Direct us on to the Straight Way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Lord), guide us to the right path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Guide us on the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Guide us to the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Keep us on the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Guide us in the straight path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Guide us to the straight path:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Guide us Thou unto the path straight
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Guide us on the straight path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Guide us to the Straight Way
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Guide us to the Straight Path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Guide us to the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Guide us to the straight path -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [1:6] Guide us to the straight path: that is, ‘show us the way to it’. This is substituted by:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Guide us to the straight path) guide us to the established Religion that You are pleased with, i.e. Islam. It is also said that this means: make us firm in holding fast to it. It is also said that the straight path refers to Allah's Book, and guidance to this means guidance to that which it prescribes as lawful or unlawful and to the exposition of its content.
